alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Central and Southern Scott County; Cleveland; Dallas; Garland; Grant; Hot Spring; Jefferson; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Northern Polk County Higher Elevations; Northern Scott County; Northwest Yell County; Perry; Polk County Lower Elevations; Saline; Southeast Polk County Higher Elevations; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Southwest Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Western and Northern Logan County; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued March 14 at 3:25AM CDT until March 14 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30. * WHERE...Portions of central, southeast, southwest and western Arkansas. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
